content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <!-- $Id: zthes-1.0.rnc,v 1.3 2006/05/01 16:09:08 mike Exp $ --> <grammar xmlns:dc="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/" xmlns="http://relaxng.org/ns/structure/1.0" datatypeLibrary="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-datatypes">   <start>     <element name="Zthes">       <optional>         <ref name="thes"/>       </optional>       <oneOrMore>         <ref name="term"/>       </oneOrMore>     </element>   </start>   <define name="thes">     <element name="thes">       <zeroOrMore>         <element name="dc:title">           <text/>         </element>       </zeroOrMore>       <zeroOrMore>         <element name="dc:creator">           <text/>         </element>       </zeroOrMore>       <zeroOrMore>         <element name="dc:subject">           <text/>         </element>       </zeroOrMore>       <zeroOrMore>         <element name="dc:description">           <text/>         </element>       </zeroOrMore>       <zeroOrMore>         <element name="dc:publisher">           <text/>         </element>       </zeroOrMore>       <zeroOrMore>         <element name="dc:contributor">           <text/>         </element>       </zeroOrMore>       <zeroOrMore>         <element name="dc:date">           <text/>         </element>       </zeroOrMore>       <zeroOrMore>         <element name="dc:type">           <text/>         </element>       </zeroOrMore>       <zeroOrMore>         <element name="dc:format">           <text/>         </element>       </zeroOrMore>       <zeroOrMore>         <element name="dc:identifier">           <text/>         </element>       </zeroOrMore>       <zeroOrMore>         <element name="dc:source">           <text/>         </element>       </zeroOrMore>       <zeroOrMore>         <element name="dc:language">           <text/>         </element>       </zeroOrMore>       <zeroOrMore>         <element name="dc:relation">           <text/>         </element>       </zeroOrMore>       <zeroOrMore>         <element name="dc:coverage">           <text/>         </element>       </zeroOrMore>       <zeroOrMore>         <element name="dc:rights">           <text/>         </element>       </zeroOrMore>       <zeroOrMore>         <ref name="thesNote"/>       </zeroOrMore>     </element>   </define>   <define name="thesNote">     <element name="thesNote">       <optional>         <attribute name="label"/>       </optional>       <optional>         <attribute name="vocab"/>       </optional>       <text/>     </element>   </define>   <define name="term">     <element name="term">       <ref name="termId"/>       <optional>         <element name="termUpdate">           <choice>             <value>add</value>             <value>delete</value>           </choice>         </element>       </optional>       <ref name="termName"/>       <optional>         <ref name="termQualifier"/>       </optional>       <optional>         <ref name="termType"/>       </optional>       <optional>         <ref name="termLanguage"/>       </optional>       <optional>         <element name="termVocabulary">           <text/>         </element>       </optional>       <zeroOrMore>         <element name="termCategory">           <text/>         </element>       </zeroOrMore>       <optional>         <element name="termStatus">           <choice>             <value>active</value>             <value>deactivated</value>             <value>deleted</value>           </choice>         </element>       </optional>       <optional>         <element name="termApproval">           <choice>             <value>candidate</value>             <value>approved</value>             <value>rejected</value>           </choice>         </element>       </optional>       <optional>         <element name="termSortkey">           <text/>         </element>       </optional>       <zeroOrMore>         <ref name="termNote"/>       </zeroOrMore>       <optional>         <element name="termCreatedDate">           <text/>         </element>       </optional>       <optional>         <element name="termCreatedBy">           <text/>         </element>       </optional>       <optional>         <element name="termModifiedDate">           <text/>         </element>       </optional>       <optional>         <element name="termModifiedBy">           <text/>         </element>       </optional>       <zeroOrMore>         <ref name="postings"/>       </zeroOrMore>       <zeroOrMore>         <ref name="relation"/>       </zeroOrMore>     </element>   </define>   <define name="termNote">     <element name="termNote">       <optional>         <attribute name="label"/>       </optional>       <optional>         <attribute name="vocab"/>       </optional>       <text/>     </element>   </define>   <define name="postings">     <element name="postings">       <ref name="sourceDb"/>       <optional>         <element name="fieldName">           <text/>         </element>       </optional>       <element name="hitCount">         <text/>       </element>     </element>   </define>   <define name="relation">     <element name="relation">       <optional>         <attribute name="weight"/>       </optional>       <ref name="relationType"/>       <optional>         <ref name="sourceDb"/>       </optional>       <ref name="termId"/>       <ref name="termName"/>       <optional>         <ref name="termQualifier"/>       </optional>       <optional>         <ref name="termType"/>       </optional>       <optional>         <ref name="termLanguage"/>       </optional>     </element>   </define>   <define name="relationType">     <element name="relationType">       <choice>         <value>NT</value>         <value>BT</value>         <value>USE</value>         <value>UF</value>         <value>RT</value>         <value>LE</value>         <data type="string">           <param name="pattern">X-.*</param>         </data>       </choice>     </element>   </define>   <!-- Elements used in multiple contexts -->   <define name="termId">     <element name="termId">       <text/>     </element>   </define>   <define name="termName">     <element name="termName">       <text/>     </element>   </define>   <define name="termQualifier">     <element name="termQualifier">       <text/>     </element>   </define>   <define name="termType">     <element name="termType">       <choice>         <value>PT</value>         <value>ND</value>         <value>NL</value>         <data type="string">           <param name="pattern">X-.*</param>         </data>       </choice>     </element>   </define>   <define name="termLanguage">     <element name="termLanguage">       <text/>     </element>   </define>   <define name="sourceDb">     <element name="sourceDb">       <data type="anyURI"/>     </element>   </define> </grammar>
